reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater to be of high quality, with one describing it as a "Scandinavian gem.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit, style & looks are authentic & marvelous
items.body: My new Norwegian sweater fits like a dream. The only I dislike is how hard the clasps are to fasten & unfasten. I love the texture & style. It goes very well with my silver hair & complexion. Read more
items.author: Becky of Iowa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A classic of fine quality
items.body: First of all, the gracious folks at Sweater Chalet treated me like a personal friend. I recommend them as sellers. This sweater is a finely crafted garment and yes, it costs a little, but the quality and workmanship justify that. With proper care it wil last a very long time. The styling is classic -- nordic sweaters have not gone out of fashion for a hundred years and are unlikely to do so anytime soon. I consider the investment I made in this sweater money well spent and am very happy with my purchase. The fit is close and snug so if you like a roomier fit, consider ordering a size up. Read more
items.author: woolnrox

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater! Very happy
items.body: High quality sweater, fits well and looks just like the picture. Very pleased. Read more
items.author: Jennifer G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My lady wife absolutely loves this sweater
items.body: It is super well made. There are "less expensive" Norwegian sweaters out there but this is the one she wanted. The do seem to run just a tad small. Which may be a good fit for some. The lady wife, while fit, is closer to 70 than 60 and is not quite so body vain as some. Customer service is top notch. Respond very quickly to inquiries and are helpful and customer oriented. Would be pleased to recommend or do business with them again. Read more
items.author: Skip, W5UTW

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING IN EVERY POSSIBLE WAY
items.body: My wife loved this gift of Norwegian Luxury. It looks great on her and is the highest quality sweater. I hit a home run with this Birthday present. The scarf was also full of beauty and luxury. It's a high quality item as well. The nice people selling this item sent me a history of the company and a hand written note thanking me for my purchase. This was such a "Worth It" experience that I would gladly recommend to anyone and everyone. Thank you so much! Read more
items.author: Shepherd_

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Beautiful, and warm but one of the buttons fell off as I was putting it on for the first time. I would think for the amount purchased they would make sure the buttons were well sewn on. For this 4 stars. Read more
items.author: Deborah B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product and well made!
items.body: Very nice sweater and gift! Read more
items.author: Steve O

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality, weird fit
items.body: The cardigan is very well made and arrived with a free hat and a nice gift from the seller. It does have a strange fit, though. I am 163 cm 50 kg and S fits me well except the sleeves. There is too much room in the armpits which makes it look baggy. The waist and hips are snug, so XS would be too tight. The seller accepted my return. Anyway, the seller is great, the cardigan is a beauty, a real Scandinavian gem, and it is such a pity that it does not fit me. Read more
items.author: Anna Zeppelina

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White/Blue, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
